vote.title: Authorize an increase in the construction services contract with John Burns Construction Company of Texas, Inc., for the emergency repair of two parallel 48-inch diameter wastewater siphons just upstream of Cottonwood Creek - Not to exceed $1,626,806.00, from $13,756,649.00 to $15,383,455.00 - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund
